bug.author: Carmezim
bug.summary: Update Cmake minimum requirement to v3.5
bug.description: As it seems to have appeared an <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17#issuecomment-258649999>issue with Cmake 3.3</denchmark-link> and the minimum known working Cmake version apparently is 3.5 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/5071#issuecomment-255490169>(see here)</denchmark-link> . Should the minimum requirement be updated on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt#L2>CmakeLists</denchmark-link> to 3.5 and the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md#pre-requisites>readme</denchmark-link> for minimum 3.5 up to 3.6? If those changes look relevant and are the ones to be made I could update them and submit a PR.

comments.comment: Sure please submit a PR. Thanks, Sherry
